intro: Will your small shop become a successful supermarket? It's in your hands.
description:
YOUR SUCCESS IS IN YOUR HANDS.
Put your entrepreneurial skills to the test in Shop Simulator: Supermarket. Immerse yourself in the world of retail and start your own business today! Will your small shop become a successful supermarket? It's in your hands.

DIFFERENT BUSINESS OPPORTUNITIES
Decide what kind of shop you want to build. From a classic supermarket to a cereal shop with countless variations, or even a shop for animal food -- the choice is yours.
 
DESIGN YOUR SHOP
Design your store exactly the way you want it. Choose from various shelves and decorations, place products as you like, and set their prices. Build the shop of your dreams!
 
MAXIMIZE YOUR PROFITS
Monitor stock levels, analyze sales data, and optimize your inventory to meet your customers' needs. Keep an eye on market prices and order strategically to maximize your profits.
 
EXPAND AND GROW
Expand your shop and diversify your inventory to bring even more variety to your business. Hire employees to be able to focus on the critical aspects of your shop.
 
MONEY MAKES THE WORLD GO 'ROUND
Scan products, charge the correct amount, and ensure that customers leave your store happy and satisfied. If too many customers come in, you can open a second checkout and staff it with an AI employee or a fellow player.
 
CLICK & COLLECT ORDERS
Move with the times and also accept online orders to reduce your customers' waiting time and make additional profits. But be careful: you need to prepare the right products to satisfy the customer and complete the order successfully.
